cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5 FATAL_ERROR)

set(PYTHON_SOLVER_MINOR_VERSION 3)
set(PYTHON_SOLVER_VERSION_STRING
    ${PYTHON_SOLVER_MAJOR_VERSION}.${genericIO_MINOR_VERSION})
